bham.leakiest

Class ProbDist

  • java.lang.Object
    • bham.leakiest.ProbDist

  • public class ProbDist
extends java.lang.Object
    This class constructs a probability distribution and offers methods for manipulating the probability distribution.
    Version:
    1.4.6
    Author:
    Tom Chothia, Yusuke Kawamoto, Chris Novakovic

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a probability distribution with initial values and lock.
      ProbDist(java.lang.String[] stateNames, double[] pmf)
      Returns the probability distribution on a given array of states with a given probability mass function.
      ProbDist(java.lang.String[] stateNames, double[] pmf, boolean lock)
      Returns the probability distribution on a given array of states with a given probability mass function.

      • isJointlySupported

        public boolean isJointlySupported()
        Check whether this probabiltiy distribution is jointly supported, i.e., p(x_1, ... , x_k) = 0 implies p(x_1) = ... = p(x_k) = 0.
        Returns:
        whether this probabiltiy distribution is jointly supported
